backend/main.mo: Main backend canister implementing user profiles, admin role management, and CRUD operations for properties with access control and blob storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Defines types from a previous version and a no-op migration function returning the old actor state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files and components involved in the admin workflow verification feature.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend source files for quick reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light/dark mode with custom OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Inter font, favicon, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for home, properties, inquiries, and admin pages using SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminManag: UI panel for granting and revoking admin access with form inputs and mutation state handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapAd: Shows guidance for obtaining admin access, including displaying and copying the user's principal ID when they are not an admin.
frontend/src/components/auth/HomepageAut: Provides a login/logout button tied to Internet Identity, handling authentication status and errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/MyPrincipal: Displays the authenticated user's principal ID with a copy-to-clipboard button.
frontend/src/components/BusinessInfoBloc: Displays business name, address, and phone number using data from siteData.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Renders the homepage hero section with a title, description, contact bar, auth button, and hero image.
frontend/src/components/inquiries/Inquir: Implements a client-side inquiry form with validation and simulated submission feedback.
Displays a list of inquiries with user details and message content, or a placeholder if empty.
frontend/src/components/layout/ContactBa: Shows contact and social media buttons with compact and default layout variants.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders footer with business info, contact details, hours, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Provides the main site header with navigation links, branding, contact bar, and conditional admin link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main site layout with header, footer, and routed content via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/properties/Inlin: Provides an inline form for creating or editing properties, supporting image uploads, YouTube video links, and chunked video uploads.
frontend/src/components/properties/Prope: Displays a property with images, video, and admin edit/delete controls, switching to InlinePropertyForm when editing.
Modal-based property editor handling basic fields and image uploads for adding or modifying a property.
Image carousel for property photos with navigation and error handling for failed image loads.
Renders a grid of PropertyCard components or an empty state message, passing admin callbacks when applicable.
frontend/src/data/siteData.ts: Defines the Property interface and provides business info, social links, and seeded sample property data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to user identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminDiagnostics.t: Fetches backend admin diagnostics including caller principal, admin list, and admin status with error fallbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminManagement.ts: Provides grant and revoke admin mutations with error normalization and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useChunkedVideoPlayba: Loads a video blob into a direct streaming URL and tracks loading/error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useChunkedVideoUpload: Uploads video files by converting to bytes, tracking progress, and returning an ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/hooks/useInquiries.ts: Stub hook returning an empty inquiries list until backend support returns.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and identity persistence via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalStorage.ts: Synchronizes a React state value with localStorage for persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePropertyListings.t: Handles querying, creating, updating, and deleting property listings with actor API and error normalization.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Checks whether the caller is an admin using available backend methods with fallbacks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables for colors and layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint initializing React, query client, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard that handles authentication, admin checks, diagnostics, and displays inquiries with refresh and error states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage rendering hero content, business highlights, and an inquiry contact section.
frontend/src/pages/InquiriesPage.tsx: Simple page showing an inquiry form with a title and description.
frontend/src/pages/PropertiesPage.tsx: Property management and listing page with admin-only create/update/delete actions and form handling.
frontend/src/README-content-transfer.md: Guide explaining how to copy business info, properties, and images to platforms like Google Sites.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines basic frontend-only types for user profiles and inquiries.
frontend/src/types/propertyVideo.ts: Defines property video type variants and logic to detect YouTube, uploaded, or none video types.
frontend/src/utils/fileToDataUrl.ts: Converts image files to data URLs with type and size validation.
frontend/src/utils/icError.ts: Normalizes IC canister errors into categorized, user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL or session parameters, including hash-based routing.
frontend/src/utils/videoFileToDataUrl.ts: Converts video files to data URLs without size limits.
frontend/src/utils/youtube.ts: Extracts YouTube IDs, validates URLs, and generates embed URLs for multiple URL formats.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and theme extensions for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s admin-system requirements, known issues, feature requests, and state metadata for improving persistent admin management.
